entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Breakpoints not working when debugging on device #43584
  • Implement XML Linting for .csproj and Related Files #43583
  • Provide sbom-tool tests with a base set of scenarios #43582
  • `dotnet build` ignores Code Quality analysis rule severity settings in `.editorconfig` #43574
  • [NETSDKE2E][workload-sets]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, Improper log displays during running "dotnet workload restore" in CLI. #43572

Closed

  • Add `--source` for `dotnet tool install` - for specifying the package source url #37716
    9.0.1xx
  • Getting "Access to the path ... is denied" on both Windows and macOS #43573

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fixup internal builds for sdk #43581
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make the toolsResolverCache path overridable using an environment variable. Fixes #11432. #43576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • T00003 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43569
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • T00002 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • T00001 - Insecure temporary file creation methods should not be used #43567
    untriaged, Area-Watch

Merged

  • Add runtimeconfig option for DataSet XML serialization #43556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43560
    Servicing-approved
  • Merged PR 43013: Subtracting 2 for the web template since September w… #43580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-format batch replace EndOfLine instead of one by one #43399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
